main event: An object shaped like a dipper, 3 ft in diameter, appeared, approached, then reversed course and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was luminous with a glow and moved at a speed of about 300 mph., No noise was heard during the observation., The object made a reversal of course before disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., William Doles provided a detailed account, but there were no other witnesses or physical evidence.
witness description: Civilian witnesses including William Doles and another individual who alerted him.
